original_text: From Benjamin's tribe that Saul belonged to, there were 3,000 men. Most of those men had served Saul faithfully until that time.
korean_text: 베냐민 자손 곧 사울의 동족은 아직도 태반이나 사울의 집을 따르나 그 중에서 나온 자가 삼천 명이요

sentences.original_text: From Benjamin's tribe that Saul belonged to
Most of those men had served Saul faithfully
